column6: CHAOS WAR tie-in! The newest, greatest and, in the carnage of the Chaos War, ONLY team of Avengers around faces the threat that united them: the Grim Reaper! And if they fall, every Avenger past and present will fall with them.
column7: | Captain Marvel (Mar-Vell) | Deathbird | Grim Reaper | Swordsman (Jaques Duquesne) | Vision | Yellowjacket (Rita DeMara)
